dlackey9999 <dlackey9999@...> wrote:                  
  Hey everybody. I've been really interested in the shinsengumi ever  since I caught a brief episode of peacemaker kurogane. However, I  realize that probably a large portion of the show is made up for tv  watchers but I was hoping that somebody could give me some information
  on them. Most sites I have been to only repeat the same thing over and over. 
  
  
  Well... as sad as this might sound, everything else that you've  probably read about the Shinsengumi is just about everything that is  known about them (Kondou, Okita, Hijikata, ect.)   Theres  very little info about them, which I guess makes them so  fascinating.  I myself have been looking up info about Nagakura  but can't can't anything new from whats already been mentioned all  across the net.   You can read some of the previous enteries  for this mailing list, they're very helpful to understanding the times  the Shinsengumi lived through.
  
  -Bunneh
